description: Hattori Shizuka is http://anidb.net/ch8178 [Hattori Heiji]`s mother, a fact that shocks http://anidb.net/ch8163 [Kogoro], http://anidb.net/ch2343 [Ran], and http://anidb.net/ch2260 [Conan], due to her incredibly youthful appearance. Heiji is the only one who insults her looks, calling her "old lady." Nonetheless, Shizuka is very supportive of her son, rooting for him to solve cases, though she sometimes calls her husband, http://anidb.net/ch8192 [Hattori Heizo], police chief of Osaka, to assist Heiji.
name: Hattori Shizuka
